department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: Fabrication and delivery of stiff legged derricks with winches in accordance with Canada’s engineered design.
tags: Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
full_summary:
EventEmitter.F1571-220408 – Stiff Leg Derrick
======================================================

**Tender Information**
----------------------

*   **Reference Number**: WS3601323131-Document3644013916
*   **Publication Date**: August 30, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date**: October 11, 2022, at 14:00 PDT

**Project Scope**
------------------

Fisheries and Oceans Canada requires the fabrication and delivery of stiff leg derricks with a winch, designed according to Canada's technical specifications.

**Submission Requirements**
-------------------------

All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted on October 11, 2022, by 14:00 PDT. Bids submitted after this hour will be considered non-responsive.

**Contract Details**
-------------------

*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: October 31, 2022
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2024

**Contact Information**
---------------------

For questions and clarifications, please contact:

*   **Eric Zwarich** (SPAC/PSPC)
    *   **Email**: <eric.zwarich@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
    *   **Phone**: [Not Available]

**Trade and Delivery**
----------------------

This project is open to businesses under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). Deliveries will take place in British Columbia.

**Notice URL**
--------------

For complete tender information, please visit:
[http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13968273?extsite=MTM5NjgyNzNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13968273?extsite=MTM5NjgyNzNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Additional Information**
-------------------------

For any inquiries, please contact Eric Zwarich at the above email address. A confirmation email will be sent once your inquiry has been processed.
